home.catchphrase: Structuring high-impact public and private projects, from local to international.

why_us_text.1: OUHDEL Conseil is not just another public affairs firm.
why_us_text.2: We are the discreet strategists and committed catalysts of the most complex territorial and institutional projects.
why_us_text.3: We believe that effective development begins with a clear vision, consistent anchoring, and solid trust between stakeholders.
why_us_text.4: Communities, businesses, landlords: we support you in structuring ambitious and sustainable projects, in France and internationally, with a constant demand for rigor, clarity and high-end quality.
why_us_text.5: At OUHDEL Conseil, we don't sell deliverables: we build, alongside you, strategies that last over time.

home.work_together_text: Whether you are a community, a business or a technical partner, we provide you with clear services, strategic support and real capacity for action.
home.work_together_click_below: Click below to discover what we can build together.

showcase_international.title: Territorial Actors
showcase_international.question: Are you a municipality, an inter-municipal authority, a resort, or agglomeration looking for a strategic, operational, and transparent offering?
showcase_international.answer: OUHDEL Conseil will support you from idea to action.

showcase_enterprise.title: Companies
showcase_enterprise.question: Are you a business looking to establish a presence, develop your local presence, or collaborate with public stakeholders?
showcase_enterprise.answer: We build your local strategy with method, clarity, and efficiency.

showcase_partners.title: Technical Partners
showcase_partners.question: Design offices, AMO, territorial agencies, SPL, SEM: your offers are technical, solid, innovative…
showcase_partners.answer: But public markets today require much more than expertise.

manifest_description.1: {0} is not a consulting firm. We are impact strategists, translators of ambition, and trusted partners.
manifest_description.2: We are convinced that the public and private projects of tomorrow will be neither purely technical nor solely political.
manifest_description.3: They will be hybrid, partnership-based, strategic, and grounded. OUHDEL Conseil was created to support these projects: those that require bringing together worlds, working with territories, negotiating with institutions, and building sustainable solutions with method and finesse.
manifest_description.4: We don't believe in ready-made recipes or grand declarations.
manifest_description.5: We believe in serious work, territorial clarity, the patient construction of alliances, and the ability to take concrete action.

who_are_we_description.1: OUHDEL Conseil is a new-generation independent firm, founded by two young experts with excellent training, united by a common conviction: high-impact projects need a strategic compass, not just an executor.
who_are_we_description.2: Originally purely focused on private consulting, OUHDEL is today a "glocal" firm, at the crossroads of public engineering, territorial development, economic diplomacy and institutional strategy.
who_are_we_description.3: We support communities, businesses and public or international institutions in structuring, securing and promoting complex projects, with rigor, political finesse and commitment to results.
who_are_we_description.4: Neither technical operators nor simple consultants: we are catalysts, translators of ambitions, and above all, your trusted partner.

our_values_description.description: At OUHDEL Conseil, we believe that each region deserves a tailor-made strategy that meets its ambitions and constraints. Our commitment is based on five pillars which guide each of our missions:

1.title: Clarity:
1.description: We provide a simple framework for complex projects. Our method is clear, our approach is structured, and our deliverables are useful.

2.title: Commitment:
2.description: We work as partners, not as service providers. We handle our clients' projects as if they were our own, with loyalty and high standards.

3.title: Trust:
3.description: This is our driving force. In our relationships with our customers, technical partners, and public stakeholders, everything begins with reliability and attentiveness.

4.title: Login:
4.description: We foster dialogue across scales, sectors, and cultures. From rural to global, from public to private, we build coalitions of stakeholders to achieve impact.

5.title: Strategic rigor:
5.description: We don't do things halfway. Every project deserves a vision, solid architecture, and overall consistency. This is what makes our brand.

about.contact_us: Contact us and receive a response as soon as possible.

our_mission_description.1: Are you a municipality, an inter-municipality, a resort or an urban area looking for clear, comprehensive and responsive strategic support?
our_mission_description.2: OUHDEL Conseil supports you in the design, structuring and promotion of your regional projects, in conjunction with the right partners, the right tools and the right financing.

items.2: Definition of high-stakes projects (public infrastructure, land, businesses, tourism, agriculture, etc.)
items.3: Prioritization of short and medium term actions
items.4: Support for the drafting of political roadmaps

items.1: Preparation of the planned progress (technical, legal, institutional)
items.2: Mobilization and coordination of partner design offices or AMOs
items.3: Identification of public and private stakeholders

items.1: Complete preparation of financing files (DETR, DSIL, Green Fund, AAP, etc.)
items.2: Adapted labeling strategy (Responsible Traders, Public Service +, Green Station, etc.)
items.3: Search for financial partners or co-investors (local banks, lessors, etc.)

items.1: Political and institutional communication around the project
items.3: Monitoring, animation and annual updating of the project

first_world_audit_description.1: Do you have a project in mind or an ambition you want to structure?
first_world_audit_description.2: We offer a free audit of your regional situation (vision, challenges, available levers) - to get you off to a solid start.

technical_partners_description.1: Are you a design office, project management assistance (AMO), public agency, SEM or SPL, and are you looking for a partner capable of covering the institutional, strategic or political aspects of your projects?
technical_partners_description.2: OUHDEL Conseil works as a co-contractor or subcontractor, with a detailed understanding of the expectations of public markets, territorial dynamics, and the requirements of public project owners.
technical_partners_description.3: We are not generalist “accompaniers”: we are professionals in institutions, public funding, political storytelling and local governance. We work alongside you to secure, enhance and enrich your offerings.

items.1: Drafting of political, governance and territorial context sections
items.2: Arguments adapted to elected officials and the administration
items.3: Translation of technical expertise into a readable territorial vision

items.1: Animation of participatory systems, elected officials-agents seminars, co-construction workshops
items.2: Advice on governance arrangements, inter-municipal coordination
items.3: Mediation in sensitive contexts or with high political stakes

items.1: Integration of grant logic into the project schedule (DSIL, DETR, Green Fund, etc.)
items.2: Labeling strategy (Responsible traders, Public service +, Green Station, Sustainable City, Eco-district, etc.)
items.3: Framework for responding to calls for projects or related AMIs

position_description.1: Are you preparing a response to a call for tender or a group in a strategic area?
position_description.2: We analyze the institutional and strategic aspects of your project free of charge to identify the areas that need strengthening and offer you a tailor-made integration into your response.
position_description.3: A quick, technical exchange between professionals.

enterprise_description.1: Are you a French or international company, and you want to better understand the territories, secure your development, or build solid relationships with public stakeholders ?
enterprise_description.2: OUHDEL Conseil helps you establish yourself, build lasting institutional partnerships, and integrate local projects and financing adapted to your sector.
enterprise_description.3: We act as a strategic interface between your business and French territorial and institutional dynamics, with a concrete, discreet and tailor-made approach.

description.1: OUHDEL Conseil supports French and foreign companies in their territorial establishment and their institutional strategy, acting as a trusted partner between private actors and public spheres.

implantation_items.1: Analysis of the most relevant locations
implantation_items.2: Networking with communities, inter-municipalities, SEMs and development agencies
implantation_items.3: Positioning in development zones or calls for local projects
implantation_items.4: Preparation of the implementation file (institutional, land, partners)

dialog_items.1: Mediation with elected officials and public decision-makers
dialog_items.2: Support in public-private negotiations and partnerships
dialog_items.3: Help in understanding local policies, public expectations, regulatory constraints
dialog_items.4: Construction of a credible and differentiating territorial storytelling

financing_items.1: Integration into public or hybrid projects (equipment, mobility, energy transition, digital, etc.)
financing_items.2: Monitoring of financing mechanisms (France 2030, region, ADEME, Green Fund, ANCT, etc.)
financing_items.3: Support for the preparation of responses to territorial calls for proposals and calls for proposals
financing_items.4: Coordination with technical stakeholders (design office, lawyers, sector experts)

enterprise.expertise: Entry into the French market (foreign companies)

expertise_items.2: Connecting with the right host areas, public stakeholders and local operators
expertise_items.3: Support for regulation, compliance, and institutional legitimation
expertise_items.4: Representation and diplomatic support to agencies and ministries

meeting_description.1: Do you want to test the opportunity of a territory, explore your institutional levers or build a local influence strategy?
meeting_description.2: We offer you a free initial confidential interview to map your needs, assess your opportunities and identify the first levers that can be activated.

our_project_description.1: Are you an Investment Structure, an NGO, a public institution or a project leader based in Eastern Europe, Central Asia, the Mediterranean or the Maghreb?
our_project_description.2: OUHDEL Conseil acts as an independent global-local operator, capable of managing or structuring territorial projects with an institutional and economic dimension, in conjunction with French communities, local stakeholders, donors and businesses.
our_project_description.3: We intervene from strategic framing to local deployment, with a detailed understanding of the issues of governance, financing, regulation and multi-stakeholder coordination.
our_project_description.4: Our expertise is rooted in French institutions, but is deployed to serve ambitious and operational international coalitions.

structuring_items.1: Complete framework for a glocal project (public or hybrid)
structuring_items.2: Co-construction with local and French partners
structuring_items.3: Advice on governance, territorial diplomacy, institutional development

financing_items.1: Identification of suitable financing lines (AFD, EU, Proparco, ENI, DAECT, Interreg, etc.)
financing_items.2: Drafting and assembly of files (project sheet, logframe, budget, strategic notes)
financing_items.3: Coordination with diplomatic representations, cooperation services, ministries

operations_items.1: Animation of coalitions and coordination of partners (South/North)
operations_items.3: Communication and promotion of the project to ensure visibility, sustainability and replicability

our_project.enterprise: Support for businesses in international projects

enterprise_items.1: Integration of economic actors in territorial projects (PPP, impact businesses, etc.)
enterprise_items.2: Support for export or strategic establishment (wood, energy, infrastructure, public services)
enterprise_items.3: Linking with public institutions and host territories

start_smart_description.1: Are you thinking about structuring a glocal project or responding to an international call for projects?
start_smart_description.2: We offer you a free framing session: 1 hour of strategic discussion to analyze your challenges, your partners, and your financing or cooperation avenues.

contact_description.1: Looking to structure a project, explore a partnership, or simply chat? At OUHDEL Conseil, every collaboration begins with a clear, honest, and no-obligation conversation. We'd love to learn more about your challenges—whether local, institutional, or international.
contact_description.2: Write us, call us, and let's meet.
